column1: Infrastructure Planning, Appraisal and Development MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe Infrastructure Planning, Appraisal and Development MSc is unique in preparing students for the major challenges ahead globally in the infrastructure field. The programme offers a holistic approach to the field offering decision-making and problem-solving that lead to more robust investment outcomes.
